name: Left At Home
description:
Freckles is left at home sick as their partner, Beads, goes out to buy them medication.

This is pretty experimental. For some odd reason, I decided to shove Binksi HD, EZM Reader, and IfThenCreate's Narrative Game Template together. Let me know if you find any bugs or typos.

Controls:
  • Enter, space, or right-click the text box to advance,
  • Right-click to make a choice,
  • In Binksy, use the arrows or WASD keys to move around and interact,
  • And in the comic, right-click the pages to flip them.

Features:

  • A Binksi game fever dream
  • A mini comic
  • Light teasing, pet names, and being needy /pos
  • 1 ending (all choices are just flavor text baby)
  • Main characters that I was too tired to actually give names to
